featured.title: The Cosmic Adventure of Luna
featured.description: Join Luna as she travels through the galaxy meeting friendly aliens and discovering new planets! Follow her journey as she learns about friendship, courage, and the wonders of space. Perfect for ages 6-10.
featured.author: Sarah Johnson

featured.title: Stardust and the Magic Rocket
featured.description: Stardust finds a magical rocket that takes them to the edge of the universe! Discover what happens when they meet the Star Guardians and learn about the power of dreams. An inspiring tale for young explorers.
featured.author: Mike Chen

featured.title: The Planet of Colors
featured.description: Discover a planet where everything is made of colors and music! Join the Color Crew as they solve mysteries and bring harmony to their vibrant world. A fun and educational story about colors and creativity.
featured.author: Emma Williams

all.title: The Cosmic Adventure of Luna
all.description: Join Luna as she travels through the galaxy meeting friendly aliens and discovering new planets!
all.author: Sarah Johnson

all.title: Stardust and the Magic Rocket
all.description: Stardust finds a magical rocket that takes them to the edge of the universe!
all.author: Mike Chen

all.title: The Planet of Colors
all.description: Discover a planet where everything is made of colors and music!
all.author: Emma Williams

all.title: Comet's Journey Home
all.description: Follow Comet as they race through space to get home before bedtime! A heartwarming story about family, time, and the importance of being home. Perfect bedtime reading for ages 6-8.
all.author: David Martinez

all.title: The Star Collector
all.description: Meet the Star Collector who gathers stars to light up the darkest corners of space! Learn about constellations and the beauty of the night sky in this educational adventure.
all.author: Sarah Johnson

all.title: Nebula's Secret
all.description: Uncover the secret hidden within the beautiful nebula clouds! Join a team of young space explorers as they discover the mysteries of cosmic clouds and learn about space science.
all.author: Mike Chen

all.title: The Friendly Alien
all.description: When Zara meets an alien from another planet, they become best friends! A story about friendship, acceptance, and learning from others who are different from us.
all.author: Emma Williams

all.title: Moon's Magic Garden
all.description: Discover a secret garden on the moon where magical plants grow! Learn about plants, gardening, and the importance of taking care of nature.
all.author: Sarah Johnson

all.title: The Time-Traveling Telescope
all.description: A magical telescope that shows the past and future! Join Alex as they learn about history, the future, and the importance of living in the present moment.
all.author: David Martinez
